NAME.NAME: Template Name
NAME.DESCRIPTION: A descriptive name for this template that should be unique per language, per domain, and will be used when referring to templates.

LANG.NAME: Language
LANG.DESCRIPTION: The language of this template. You may create many versions of this template, one for each language.

DESCRIPTION.NAME: Description
DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION: Provide a short description for this template.

CONTENT.NAME: Content
CONTENT.DESCRIPTION: The html content of the template. Feel free to make use of the template fields to enhance the personality of the content. Avoid using images to present text.

ERRORS.EDIT: Could not open edit for template

HEADER.TITLE: Templates
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: A searchable list of all templates
